job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: Job OverviewAs a Data Scientist at the BudLab, based in Cambridge, MA, you will be responsible to execute research and development (R&D) projects in analytics. In this position, you are expected to act as the interface between our academic partners and business stakeholders, maximizing value generation from these engagements.This position requires the use of complex theoretical and practical knowledge to solve business problems from an analytical perspective. While managing projects, it will also be required that you develop the solution along with the parties involved, performing tasks related to data engineering, data exploration, or modeling whenever necessary.Responsibilities and DutiesPartner closely with academics (professors, researchers, and students) to develop solutions for business problems using data analyticsPerform scientific literature review using a hypothesis-driven approach to perform primary and secondary researchIdentify areas of opportunity for increased efficiency, drive transformation through routine plans and executionBased on data exploration, develop quantitative models that will improve the overall performance of different business units (e.g., demand forecast models, financial risk assessment of production volume, profitability analysis)Analyze research results and provide insights and recommendations to solving complex problems in transportation, water resources management, corporate finance, and many other areas of the companyContribute with original scientific observations by communicating scientific information to business stakeholdersRequired QualificationsBachelorâs degree in a STEM field + at least 2 years of DS experience or masterâs degree in STEM fieldAt least 2 years of experience in quantitative research and data analyticsProficiency in Python and use of machine learning algorithmsExperience in a relationship management positionAbout Anheuser-Busch InBevAnheuser-Busch InBev is a publicly traded company (Euronext: ABI) based in Leuven, Belgium, with secondary listings on the Mexico (MEXBOL: ANB) and South Africa (JSE: ANH) stock exchanges and with American Depositary Receipts on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: BUD). Our Dream is to bring people together for a better world.Beer, the original social network, has been bringing people together for thousands of years. We are committed to building great brands that stand the test of time and to brewing the best beers using the finest natural ingredients. Our brewing heritage dates back more than 600 years, spanning continents and generations. From our European roots at the Den Hoorn brewery in Leuven, Belgium. To the pioneering spirit of the Anheuser & Co brewery in St. Louis, US. To the creation of the Castle Brewery in South Africa during the Johannesburg gold rush. To Bohemia, the first brewery in Brazil. Geographically diversified with a balanced exposure to developed and developing markets, we leverage the collective strengths of approximately 200,000 employees based in more than 50 countries worldwide. In 2015, on a combined pro forma basis, AB InBev realized 55.5 billion US dollar in revenues (excluding JVs and associates).Visit us @ www.ab-inbev.comLike us @ www.facebook.com/abinbevFollow us @ www.twitter.com/abinbevnews
